title: Michael Beck, 65, Dies; First to Report Symptoms of ‘Havana Syndrome’
summary_full: As an employee with the N.S.A., he claimed he was exposed to a direct-energy device that led to a diagnosis of Parkinson’s disease.
summary_public: As an employee with the N.S.A., he claimed he was exposed to a direct-energy device that led to a diagnosis of Parkinson’s disease.
